item.title: PHP insert into SQL database from Fetch POST
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: As a Javascript developer, I always prefer to use NodeJS as my API endpoint when interacting with a backend database. Unfortunately, it’s not always feasible to use NodeJS (especially in a shared hosting environment) and you might have to fall back to good old PHP. So here’s a quick refresher on how you can insert an object into an SQL database from javascript using php. If you haven’t already, check out my previous tutorial on making SQL queries from PHP using fetch API.
